article_title: The Very Hopeful Economics Of Obamacare's Cadillac Tax

article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall

og.description: An interesting little point about the economics assumed by the "cadillac tax" in the ACA, or Obamacare. Please note, this isn't about the reforms themselves, nor what we should be doing about health care. That's not my remit at all. However, there's a rather questionable economic assumption being made here [...]
